title: Is there 2 for 1 rune page sale any more?
body: I think the sale comes out every half a year or so, but seems like it's a bit overdue. Does anyone know if they still have this sale any more? THanks.

replies.body: If I remember right it's once every 6-12months, if I had to guess I'd say the next one will be around preseason a bit after Worlds has ended.

according to both of you, it shouldve happened around june/july before another one comes at the start of next year. i think it is every 6 months. of course since rito dont give a fook about anyone they can do whatever they want. worlds is in paris, maybe they need more people buying rune pages to compensate for that extravagant expense haha
All right. Sounds like I should be a bit patient.
